short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A custom Dracula Theme for ChatGPT.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The "ChatGPT Dracula Custom Theme" is a visually striking and meticulously crafted CSS theme designed for enhancing the user interface of ChatGPT with a dark, gothic aesthetic. Inspired by the popular Dracula theme known for its pleasing color palette which reduces eye strain, this theme is ideal for users who spend long hours engaging with ChatGPT, especially in low-light environments.
